etl.query:
SELECT bme.Path, ps.PerfmonInstanceName, pdav.SampleValue, pdav.TimeSampled FROM PerformanceDataAllView (NOLOCK) AS pdav INNER JOIN PerformanceSource (NOLOCK) ps ON pdav.PerformanceSourceInternalId = ps.PerformanceSourceInternalId INNER JOIN Rules (NOLOCK) r ON ps.RuleId = r.RuleId INNER JOIN BaseManagedEntity (NOLOCK) bme ON ps.BaseManagedEntityID = bme.BaseManagedEntityID WHERE (r.RuleName ='Microsoft.Windows.Server.2003.LogicalDisk.FreeMB.Collection' OR r.RuleName ='Microsoft.Windows.Server.2008.LogicalDisk.FreeMB.Collection' OR r.RuleName ='Microsoft.Windows.Server.6.2.LogicalDisk.FreeMB.Collection') AND pdav.TimeSampled = (SELECT MAX(TimeSampled) FROM PerformanceDataAllView WHERE PerformanceSourceInternalId = pdav.PerformanceSourceInternalId);
INSERT INTO freespace_mb(Server_name, Drive_letter, MB_free, Time) VALUES (?PerfmonInstanceName, ?Path, ?SampleValue, ?TimeSampled);

SELECT bme.Path, ps.PerfmonInstanceName, pdav.SampleValue, pdav.TimeSampled FROM PerformanceDataAllView (NOLOCK) AS pdav INNER JOIN PerformanceSource (NOLOCK) ps ON pdav.PerformanceSourceInternalId = ps.PerformanceSourceInternalId INNER JOIN Rules (NOLOCK) r ON ps.RuleId = r.RuleId INNER JOIN BaseManagedEntity (NOLOCK) bme ON ps.BaseManagedEntityID =bme.BaseManagedEntityID WHERE (r.RuleName ='Microsoft.Windows.Server.2003.LogicalDisk.FreeSpace.Collection' OR r.RuleName ='Microsoft.Windows.Server.2008.LogicalDisk.FreeSpace.Collection' OR r.RuleName ='Microsoft.Windows.Server.6.2.LogicalDisk.FreeSpace.Collection') AND pdav.TimeSampled = (SELECT MAX(TimeSampled) FROM PerformanceDataAllView WHERE PerformanceSourceInternalId = pdav.PerformanceSourceInternalId );
INSERT INTO freespace_percent(Server_name, Drive_letter, Free_space_Percentage, Time) VALUES (?PerfmonInstanceName, ?Path, ?SampleValue, ?TimeSampled);
